attributes.action: Require the banks to set aside shares in trust to compensate for the taxpayers money used to support their industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Require the banks and financial instutions that have been supported by recent government actions in the money markets, to issue 5% extra shares to be put in trust for future tax payers.
These shares would be used to provide dividend income that would supplement government tax income for the future.
